ygData.subject: Re: OOC - Beast Machines?
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, Beast Machines has not happened in this continuity. However at the moment Cryotek is here on ancient earth and he seems to have the BM generals with him.

Nope, Beast Machines has not happened in this continuity.

However at the moment Cryotek is here on ancient earth and he seems to
have the BM generals with him. At the moment though the Maximals and
Autobots are unaware of that fact.

His aims and goals have yet to be revealed.

- Preston

On 7/18/11, adamsafran <adamsafran@...> wrote:
> I'm wondering if Beast Machines has any bearing on continuity/what happens
> here?  OR if due to the timeline nullifications it's not happened in any
> chance.  Or if it's not popular with the players, in which case it's
> preferred nto to referencet hings from it?
>
>
